ygData.subject: Re: More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For us it s ... There was a recent survey done and posted on Everlore about women in EQ.  It turns out that the majority of players are male, big surprise.
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Dawn" <dlb@p...> wrote:
> I'm a woman and I play a woman. My son and daughter also play.
For us it's
> a real family affair. I'm 43, my son is 22 and my daughter is 18.
>
> Kanalyn 16 Druid
> Analyn 9 Beastlord
> Allilee 6 Ranger
> Maralexis 6 Wizard
>
> Tarew Marr

There was a recent survey done and posted on Everlore about women in
EQ. It turns out that the majority of players are male, big
surprise. And that almost 50% of all female characters are really
guys.

Women generally play female characters, but even here in fantasyland
the are some players and guilds that don't take a female character
seriously! The male character seems to get more respect and
leadership positions in these situations. So some women play male
characters and see a difference in how they are treated by these same
people! It's sad.

And even I have been known to be soft on the ladies. Hey, it's a
game of Chivalry after all!

Tuldayen
35th Season Ranger of Tunare
